experience.title: City Leader
experience.description: Nurturing and expanding the London entrepreneurial community by hosting pitching events, connecting startups with growth opportunities, and bringing together innovative minds and sponsors who share passion for the startup ecosystem

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Founder of Unlock Consultancy – an international, non-profit student consultancy group launched with the goal to address challenges faced by the worst affected businesses and economies in the world with specific attention to startups and businesses run by ethnic minorities and disadvantaged sections of society, while simultaneously providing a platform for students to engage with real-life businesses.

positions.subtitle: King's Business School
positions.description: King's Business School 20 is a panel of 20 students that meets with panel Chair VP Education Arts and Science, and co-chair Vice Dean (Education) Professor Sally Everett, to be consulted on issues that impact the student experience in the faculty. This could be learning and teaching, input into quality assurance processes,student community and other topics relating to student's experience within King's Business School.

experience.title: Mayor's Entrepreneur Intern
experience.description: Selected as one of the 30 Mayor's Entrepreneur Interns for the year.It is a six months internship that aims to develop and support the Mayor's Entrepreneurship Competition, from November 2019 to May 2020, to help budding entrepreneurs from all London universities gain access to mentorship, skill development workshops and prize money to grow their business.

positions.subtitle: KCL India Society
positions.description: Elected as the Vice President for Events in the committee of KCL India Society 2018-19. The role entails the responsibility of securing sponsors for the events of the society, catering to more than 3000 students annually by organizing annual events. It also involves working in close collaboration with the Sales and Marketing team as well as other similar societies in London.
